affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 110/120/130/140
COOLDOWN: 13/12/11/10
desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile

attrib:
ARMOR REDUCTION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
VISION DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
DEBUFF DURATION: 20 / 20 / 20 / 20
cmb:
MANA COST: 40/40/40/40
COOLDOWN: 20
desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.
lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror

desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases nearby friendly units' physical damage.
notes: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.
lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
name: vengefulspirit_command_aura

cmb:
MANA COST: 100/150/200
COOLDOWN: 45
desc:
Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Works on magic immune units.
Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
